name: HepatitisBVaccineAdministered
title: Hepatitis B Vaccine Administered
purpose: (Clinical Focus: The purpose of this value set is to represent concepts for a Hepatitis B vaccination.),(Data Element Scope: This value set may use a model element related to Procedure.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes concepts that represent a procedure for a Hepatitis B vaccination.),(Exclusion Criteria: No exclusions.)

contains.display: Administration of vaccine product containing only acellular Bordetella pertussis and Clostridium tetani and Corynebacterium diphtheriae and Haemophilus influenzae type b and Hepatitis B virus and inactivated Human poliovirus antigens (procedure)
Administration of vaccine product containing only Hepatitis B virus antigen (procedure)
Administration of first dose of vaccine product containing only Hepatitis B virus antigen (procedure)
Administration of second dose of vaccine product containing only Hepatitis B virus antigen (procedure)

Administration of booster dose of vaccine product containing only Hepatitis B virus antigen (procedure)

Administration of fifth dose of vaccine product containing only Hepatitis B virus antigen (procedure)
Administration of first dose of vaccine product containing only Hepatitis A and Hepatitis B virus antigens (procedure)
Administration of second dose of vaccine product containing only Hepatitis A and B virus antigens (procedure)
Administration of third dose of vaccine product containing only Hepatitis A and Hepatitis B virus antigens (procedure)
Administration of booster dose of vaccine product containing only Hepatitis A and Hepatitis B virus antigens (procedure)
Administration of vaccine product containing only Hepatitis A and Hepatitis B virus antigens (procedure)
Administration of vaccine product containing only acellular Bordetella pertussis and Corynebacterium diphtheriae and Hepatitis B virus and inactivated whole Human poliovirus antigens (procedure)
Administration of sixth dose of vaccine product containing only Hepatitis B virus antigen (procedure)

Diphtheria, tetanus toxoids, acellular pertussis vaccine, inactivated poliovirus vaccine, Haemophilus influenzae type b PRP-OMP conjugate vaccine, and hepatitis B vaccine (DTaP-IPV-Hib-HepB), for intramuscular use
